name: Basic Cleaning Service
description: Our basic cleaning service includes thorough cleaning of your home or office space. We focus on essential areas to provide a clean and fresh environment.

name: Deep Cleaning Package
description: Our deep cleaning package offers a comprehensive cleaning experience. We pay attention to every detail to ensure your space is spotless and hygienic.

name: Office Cleaning Service
description: We specialize in providing professional cleaning services for offices and commercial spaces. A clean workspace promotes productivity and a positive work environment.

name: Eco-Friendly Cleaning
description: Our eco-friendly cleaning service uses environmentally safe products and methods. Experience a clean home while contributing to a greener planet.

name: Move-In/Move-Out Cleaning
description: Moving can be stressful. Let us handle the cleaning! Our move-in/move-out cleaning service ensures your new or old place is immaculate and ready for the next chapter.

name: Weekly Home Cleaning
description: Enjoy a consistently clean home with our weekly cleaning service. Our experienced cleaners will maintain the cleanliness of your home, allowing you to focus on what matters most.
